headline: Will Paramount's Expanded UFC Rights Boost TKO Group Holdings' (TKO) Global Streaming Appeal?
summary: Paramount, a Skydance Corporation, and UFC recently announced a seven-year, multi-territory partnership expansion to bring UFC media rights to Paramount+ subscribers across Latin America and Australia starting in 2026, following an earlier landmark U.S. exclusivity deal. This move provides UFC fans in these regions access to all premiere events at no additional cost and strengthens Paramount+'s positioning as a unified sports destination. We'll review how broadening UFC's global content...
